description: Generate a device location event summary.
permissions: User must be an admin to create the summary. Results are constrained to devices in the user’s policy scope because the server injects a current_user filter.
side_effects: Reads and aggregates device location event day summaries with related device and user data; no persistent changes.
validation_notes: group-by values must be valid summary attributes; filters must use supported keys; included metrics must be valid; sort values must reference valid summary attributes or metrics; filters cannot be blank. --filters must be valid JSON, and --filter must be in key=value form with a non-empty key.

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to device unless set.
flags.validation: Values must be from: device, device_identifier, device_manufacturer, device_model, device_name, device_platform, device_version, event_on, native_app_version, native_ota_version, user. Example: device,user.

flags.name: --all-metrics
flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API.

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Format key=value with a non-empty key. Example: event_on_min=2025-01-01.
